summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2360 for the improvement of Third Avenue, from Virginia Street to Cedar Street; Virginia Street, Lenora Street, Blanchard Street, Bell Street, Battery Street, Wall Street, Vine Street and Cedar Street, each from First Avenue to the Alley between Third Avenue and Fourth Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by the installation of a system of cluster lights along the curb line of each of said streets and avenues, together with the installation of such poles, conduits and wires as may be necessary for the proper installation and equipment of said system; under Ordinance No. 24668, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
